title: All such heritage structures shall be documented in the Heritage List Card as given in Appendix-L and the Heritage List Card shall be duly authenticated by the authorised heritage conservationist upon his site visit, stating the significance of heritage site for its appropriate grading
clause_text: All such heritage structures shall be documented in the Heritage List Card as given in Appendix-L and the Heritage List Card shall be duly authenticated by the authorised heritage conservationist upon his site visit, stating the significance of heritage site for its appropriate grading.
section: Preparation of List of Heritage Buildings, Heritage Precincts and Natural Features
